welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Clawson, a quaint city known for its charming small-town atmosphere and friendly community. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, local restaurants, and unique shops. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Clawson has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Detroit City Airport is dedicated to serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting the 'Selfridge Airport WiFi' network and entering a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pontiac Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Windsor Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Windsor Airport serves regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The McNamara Terminal is the main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal is used for domestic flights by low-cost carriers and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Run Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Run Airport handles freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
